import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import '../styles/userinfo.css'; const UserInfo = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); if (!user) return (
Silakan login terlebih dahulu
); return (

Profil Pengguna

{user.name?.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

{user.name || '-'}

{user.email || '-'}

{user.nim || '-'}

{user.roleName || '-'}

{user.province || '-'}

{user.city || '-'}

{user.birthDate || '-'}

{user.gender || '-'}

{user.phone || '-'}

); }; export default UserInfo;
